articles.title: Kader Khan`s eldest son Abdul Quddus dies in Canada - Zee News
articles.description: Late actor Kader Khan s son Abdul Quddus passed away in Canada on Thursday (April 1). The cause of death was not immediately known. Quddus was the eldest son of Khan with his first wife. He worked as a security officer at an airport in Canada.
